channel.title: tech on Developer Playground
channel.description: Recent content in tech on Developer Playground

item.title: Cannot start docker desktop on win 10 home 2004
item.description: 윈도우 버전 확인 winver WSL 2 Linux 커널 업데이트 https://docs.microsoft.com/ko-KR/windows/wsl/wsl2-kernel wsl -l -v WSL 2 로 변환Link to WSL 2 로 변환 wsl --set-version Ubuntu 2 Default wsl --set-default Ubuntu Remove docker Install docker

item.title: Ubuntu 18.04, Kafka 설치
item.description: 요구사항 Kafka 2.12 OpenJDK 11.0.3 Ubuntu 18.04 환경 확인 시스템 정보 $ uname -a Linux kafka 4.15.0-52-generic #56-Ubuntu SMP Tue Jun 4 22:49:08 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux OS 종류 확인 $ cat /etc/issue Ubuntu 18.
